name: Traggo
short_description: Tag-based time tracking with stopwatch, reports, and data export.
description: Traggo is a lightweight time tracking server built with Go. Unlike traditional time trackers with projects and tasks, Traggo uses tags for complete flexibility. Features include stopwatch for active timing, manual time entry, tag-based organization, custom date ranges, break tracking, data export (CSV, JSON), REST API, and a clean responsive UI. Perfect for freelancers tracking billable hours or anyone wanting simple time logging.
usecases: Track time spent on different activities using tags.
Log billable hours for client work.
Generate reports on time spent per tag.
